GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v6.0.2
GSD.description:
wifi: cfg80211: avoid nontransmitted BSS list corruption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.2 by commit 377cb1ce85878c197904ca8383e6b41886e3994d, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 0b8fb8235be8be99a197e8d948fc0a2df8dc261a. For more details please see the references link.
